title: DementiaCare+
desc: A holistic program to serve the needs of dementia caretakers in pakistan.

section.title: DementiaCare+ To The Rescue
section.desc: Dementia Caretakers engage in both noble and overwhelming endeavors every day. Being a Dementia Caretaker is a strenous job due to the level of demand and attention required by the patients. The purpose of this application is to provide job-related assistance to the people starting out as dementia caretakers.

column.title: Community Forum
column.desc: We understand that starting out as a caretaker for dementia patients is challenging, especially when you are not aware of the intricate care that patients need. Dementiacareâ€™s community feature connects you with myriad of helpful people who can assist you with the job.

column.title: Patient Tracking
column.desc: One of the primary issues associated with dementia care is the frequent risk of patients wandering off. To resolve ghe problem, we have introduced a jifty system of tracking mechanism. It allows you to track the location of the patients through android or smartwatch.

column.title: Find Help
column.desc: Taking care of individual dementia patients at home is difficult. Dementiacare+ seeks to to make the task easier by bridging the gap between professional and individual caretakers. The app hosts a list of verified professional which are filtered according to your location.
